segments.text: The adult woman is so engrossed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's on full, basin can't hold it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow hits the cabinet doors, streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widens on the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She wears a dress and apron, looking everyday.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden view through the window is inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and fence make it look maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs the stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is for the full cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool unstable, could topple him backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands expectant, palm open nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Contrast between calm outside and risks inside is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope no one gets hurt in this setup.
segments.speaker: PAR
